com.m3rcuriel.controve.util

Class Values

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.m3rcuriel.controve.util.Values

  • public final class Values
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing various static utility methods and generators dealing with numerical values.

    • Method Detail

      • fuzzyCompare

        public static int fuzzyCompare(double a,
                               double b)
        Compare two numbers to within a certain number of bits, defaulting to 12 bits.
        Parameters:
        a - the first number
        b - the second number
        Returns:
        0 if the numbers are the same, 1 if a is greater, and -1 if b is greater
        See Also:
        fuzzyCompare(double, double, int)

      • fuzzyCompare

        public static int fuzzyCompare(double a,
                               double b,
                               int bits)
        Compare two numbers to within a certain number of bits.
        Parameters:
        a - the first number
        b - the second number
        bits - the number of bits of accuracy desired
        Returns:
        0 if the numbers are the same, 1 if a is greater, -1 if b is greater

      • limiter

        public static java.util.function.DoubleFunction<java.lang.Double> limiter(double minimum,
                                                                          double maximum)
        Construct and return an DoubleFunction which limits a value to between two other values.
        Parameters:
        minimum - the minimum possible value
        maximum - the maximum possible value; must be greater than the minimum
        Returns:
        the limiting function
